account_number_id.description: The Account Number to which the recipient should send funds.

amount.description: The amount requested from the recipient, in cents.

message_to_recipient.description: A message the recipient will see as part of the request.

recipient_account_number.description: The drawdown request's recipient's account number.

recipient_address_line1.description: Line 1 of the drawdown request's recipient's address.

recipient_address_line2.description: Line 2 of the drawdown request's recipient's address.

recipient_address_line3.description: Line 3 of the drawdown request's recipient's address.

recipient_routing_number.description: The drawdown request's recipient's routing number.

$block: Wire drawdown requests enable you to request that someone else send you a wire. This feature is in beta; reach out to [support@increase.com](mailto:support@increase.com) to learn more.

$ul: **account_number_id**: The Account Number to which the recipient of this request is being requested to send funds.
**amount**: The amount being requested in cents.
**currency**: The [ISO 4217](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217) code for the amount being requested. Will always be "USD".
**fulfillment_transaction_id**: If the recipient fulfills the drawdown request by sending funds, then this will be the identifier of the corresponding Transaction.
**message_to_recipient**: The message the recipient will see as part of the drawdown request.
**recipient_account_number**: The drawdown request's recipient's account number.
**recipient_address_line1**: Line 1 of the drawdown request's recipient's address.
**recipient_address_line2**: Line 2 of the drawdown request's recipient's address.
**recipient_address_line3**: Line 3 of the drawdown request's recipient's address.
**recipient_routing_number**: The drawdown request's recipient's routing number.
**status**: The lifecycle status of the drawdown request.
**submission**: After the drawdown request is submitted to Fedwire, this will contain supplemental details.
**input_message_accountability_data**: The input message accountability data (IMAD) uniquely identifying the submission with Fedwire.
**type**: A constant representing the object's type. For this resource it will always be `wire_drawdown_request`.
